docs.title: Contoso Launches Multimodal API
docs.snippet: Contoso introduced a multimodal API with latency targets under 300ms, focusing on retail and support automation.

docs.title: Fabrikam Expands EU Regions
docs.snippet: Fabrikam added two EU regions with stricter data residency controls to address regulated customers.

docs.title: Northwind Ships Governance Toolkit
docs.snippet: Northwind released governance templates and incident trackers, aiming to shorten enterprise security reviews.

docs.title: GPU Pricing Adjustments Announced
docs.snippet: Several vendors rebalanced GPU pricing tiers as capacity increased, offering discounts for steady, predictable workloads.

docs.title: Benchmark Results for Text+Vision
docs.snippet: Independent tests show improved accuracy on captioning and OCR tasks, with performance varying by context length and image complexity.
